mapper.sql: id, name, phone, address, description, video_url AS videoUrl, begin_time AS beginTime, end_time AS endTime, create_time AS createTime
mapper.select: select ,z.app_name as appName,s.delivery_distance as deliveryDistance,s.delivery_great_money as deliveryGreatMoney,s.delivery_less_money as deliveryLessMoney,s.delivery_money as deliveryMoney,s.is_delivery isDelivery ,s.is_reach_pay as isReachPay,s.is_self_pickup as isSelfPickup,s.order_phone as orderPhone,s.default_desc as defaultDesc,s.default_refund_reason as defaultRefundReason from t_owner w left join s_wx_app z on w.id = z.owner_id left join t_owner_config s on w.id = s.owner_id where w.id = #{owner_id}
